realtime.title: Realtime datas
realtime.description: The data are polled from FOEV and updated on the website every ten minutes.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: This application is open source meaning you can read, modify and share the code.

unverified.title: Unverified
unverified.description: All informations on the website are live and therefore subject to variations from reality.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: The application is designed to be used on any device, from desktop to mobile.
